attributes.action: A second Brexit referendum is needed.
attributes.additional_details:
UK Statistics Authority
Institute for Fiscal Studies
attributes.background:
True facts now coming out about Brexit:
Less food safety, agricultural green subsidies, workers rights. Higher WTO trade tariffs, more red tape, delays at ports.
Irish border dispute.
£156 million/week from UK to EU not £350 million/week.
UK less influential within EU.
£37 billion divorce bill.
